comments.body: I think these aliases are more likely to deal with "transaction value-ness" than "versioned value-ness", though perhaps `Event` _et al_ deserve associated aliases for this, too.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +30,34 @@  val NodeExercises: N.NodeExercises.type = N.NodeExercises

  type Event[Nid, Cid] = E.Event[Nid, Cid, T.Transaction.Value[Cid]]

  type Events[Nid, Cid] = E.Event.Events[Nid, Cid, T.Transaction.Value[Cid]]
